amendment.description: To ensure that American children have high-quality health coverage that fits their individual needs.
amendment.purpose: To ensure that American children have high-quality health coverage that fits their individual needs.

action.text: Amendment SA 86 proposed by Senator Coburn.

vote.text: Amendment SA 86 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 62. Record Vote Number: 28.
